heading: Sign in to your Spifex account
subheading: Keep your cash flow under control in one place.
emailNotVerified: Email not verified. Please check your inbox to activate your account.
accountInactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact support.
tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
unexpectedError: Unexpected error. Please try again later.
twoFactorSubheading: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your email.
twoFactorRequired: Two-factor authentication is enabled. Check your email for a 6-digit code.
twoFactorExpired: This code expired. Please sign in again.
twoFactorResendTooSoon: Please wait a moment before requesting a new code.
